== Paralam (CT) (627863) ==

Paralam (CT) is a town in the [[Thrissur]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 4.72 sq. km. and harbouring 2234 households with total population of 9187 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 10 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 300 km. Male population is 4498 and female population is 4689. Scheduled Caste population is 1488 and Scheduled Tribes population is 28. Census Location Code of the town is 627863<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class V (population_total 5,000 to 9,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 10 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 90 km. Railway station is at Ollur at a distance of 7 km.
